A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Okay I have to admit\, I was somewhat shocked and dazed the first time I watched this movie. I was a little uncertain with how I felt about it. After watching the movie for a second time however\, I enjoyed it a lot more! I appreciated the risks the director took to make a completely unique movie in the Star Wars franchise. In my opinion\, Daisy Ridley and Adam Driver really shined throughout the movie. I would've liked a little more focus on the Jedi\, however after the second viewing\, I recognized that Johnson was just trying to create a well-balanced focus on all the characters\, which I think he accomplished. I understand why some of the people are giving harsh reviews on this movie; it is a lot to digest\, however after having some time to think about everything that happened\, I understand why the critics have been raving. What Rian Johnson has created is nothing short of a masterpiece\, sure it's a little unexpected and unique\, but that's what makes it amazing!
